Descriptor.Name: Mean atomic electronegativity of Sanderson
Descriptor.Description: Me is statistically less relevant, plays an important role in the extension of the AD of the model, in particular to aromatic compounds.

Descriptor.Name: Number of benzene rings
Descriptor.Description: nBnz encodes for the different reactivity of aliphatic and aromatic chemicals in relation to the attack sites for nitrate radicals.

Descriptor.Name: Energy of the highest occupied molecular orbital
Descriptor.Description: Calculated by the semi-empirical PM3 Hamiltonian. HOMO energy is a measure of the nucleophilicity of a molecule or the affinity toward attack by electrophiles, such as the nitrate radical: more reactive chemicals have high HOMO energy values.
